title: 288: American Idol Auditions + Jess’ Vacation + ADHD/Anxiety + Bekah’s Future Career!
itunes:title: 288: American Idol Auditions + Jess’ Vacation + ADHD/Anxiety + Bekah’s Future Career!
description:
Hey there, Broad Squad! Today Bekah and Jess have a cozy “fireside” chat where they spend some time catching up on their current lives + some serious #tangentialbroads moments! Jess tells her embarrassing American Idol audition story, they chat about a wild story from her recent vacation, the zoo in Bekah’s house, a hamster PSA, what Bekah is looking into for her future career, Star Wars, Bekah’s upcoming ADHD assessment, Jess’s recent anxiety, and a lot more! 

 

GET TICKETS TO THE LIVE ONLINE “ALMOST PARADISE" SHOW HERE: https://app.loopedlive.com/c/3679

 

THANKS TO OUR SPONSORS:

***RELIEF BAND: go to RELIEFBAND.COM and use code CHATTY to get 20% off plus free shipping and a no-questions-asked 30-day money-back guarantee!

***MODERN FERTILITY: get $20 off the test when you go to MODERNFERTILITY.COM/CHATTY

***STAMPS.COM: go to STAMPS.COM for a 4-week trial PLUS free postage and a digital scale by clicking on the microphone at the top of the homepage and typing in CHATTY

***UPSTART: Upstart can lower your monthly payments today when you go to UPSTART.COM/CHATTY
